div.head: 水穀不下
div.div: water and grain failing to move down

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: water and grain failing to move down

sense.def: Illness Sign of an inability to swallow beverages or food. Wei sheng bao jian 衛生寶鑒 11: 備急如聖散，治時氣 纏喉，風漸入咽喉，閉塞，水穀不下，牙關緊急，不省人事 , “The ‘powder that prepares people for urgencies like a sage’ cures seasonal qi constricting the throat, wind gradually entering the throat, and closing it with the result that water and grain fail to move down . The mandibular joints are firmly clenched. Patients do not recognize other people or things”.
